    void
    AddBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to create a booking object, add a customer reference to the relative flight object, add a booking reference to the relative customer object
    void
    AddCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to create a new customer object grabs the biggest ID value of a customer, and adds 1 to it when creating the new customer creates the new customer object with the details given by user
    void
    AddFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to create a new flight object grabs the biggest ID value of a flight, and adds 1 to it when creating the new flight creates the new flight object with the details given by user
    void
    CancelBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to cancel a booking grabs all bookings and looks for the specified booking calculates the cancellation fee updates the status of the relative booking removes the customer from the flight object

    void
    DeleteCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to disable a customer from the system grabs the ID of the specified customer and sets the status of the customer to inactive
    void
    DeleteFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to disable a flight from the system grabs the ID of the flight, and sets the status of the flight to disabled
    void

    method that prints out the help message to show all commands
    void
    ListCustomers.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to show all the customers in the system grabs all the users in the system into a list, and iterates through the list to print out each customer one by one also shows the size of the list
    void
    ListFlights.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to show all the flights in the system grabs all the flights in the system into a list, and iterates through the list to print out each flight one by one filter is applied to only show active flights also shows the size of the list
    void
    LoadGUI.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to open the GUI
    void
    ShowCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to show a customer's details grabs the relative customer via ID then displays details about it
    void
    ShowFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to show a flight's details grabs the relative flight via ID then displays details about it
    void
    UpdateBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    method to update a booking grabs the relative booking via the booking ID grabs the current flight on the booking grabs the new flight ID provided by the user grabs the relative customer via the customer ID in the booking calculates a rebooking fee updates the booking details to conatin the new flight updates the passenger list of the flights
